summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current contents of all general parameter registers (GPRMs).

param.name: pRegisterArray
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved array of general parameter registers.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .
Use of GPRMs is title specific. GPRMs are general parameter registers. For an explanation of GPRMs, see the DVD specifications.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current contents of all system parameter registers (SPRMs).

param.name: pRegisterArray
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved array of system parameter registers.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .
For use of individual registers, see the DVD-Video specification.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the number of available angles and the currently selected angle number.

param.name: pulAnglesAvailable
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of available angles. If the value pointed to equals 1, then the current video does not contain multiple angles.

param.name: pulCurrentAngle
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved current angle number.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: Angles are interleaved video streams that presumably contain the same scene shot from different camera angles.
This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the number of available audio streams and the number of the currently selected audio stream.

param.name: pulStreamsAvailable
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of available audio streams

param.name: pulCurrentStream
param.para: Pointer to the current stream number.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the attributes for the current audio stream in the current title or menu.

param.name: pATR
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved audio attributes.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_VideoManagerMenu, DVD_DOMAIN_VideoTitleSetMenu, or DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .
For information about the DVD_AudioATR data type, consult the DVD-Video specification.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the number of available buttons and the currently selected button number.

param.name: pulButtonsAvailable
param.para: Pointer to the number of buttons available.

param.name: pulCurrentButton
param.para: Pointer to the number of the current button.

description.para: Success.
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: If buttons are not present this method returns zero for both pnButtonsAvailable and pnCurrentButton.
This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current DVD domain of the DVD player.

param.name: pDomain
param.para: Pointer to the current domain that is a member of the enumerated type.

description.para: Success.
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current playback location.

param.name: pLocation
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved playback location information in a structure.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method retrieves information sufficient to restart playback of a video from the current playback location in titles that don't explicitly disable seeking to the current location.
This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the number of available subpicture streams, the currently selected subpicture stream number, and whether the subpicture display is disabled.

param.name: pulStreamsAvailable
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of available subpicture streams.

param.name: pulCurrentStream
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of the currently selected subpicture stream.

param.name: pIsDisabled
param.para: Pointer to a value indicating whether the subpicture display is disabled.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: Subpicture streams authored as forcedly activated streams will be displayed even if the application has disabled subpicture display with the method.
This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the attributes for the current subpicture stream in the current title or menu.

param.name: pATR
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved subpicture attributes.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_VideoManagerMenu, DVD_DOMAIN_VideoTitleSetMenu, or DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .
For information about DVD_SubpictureATR, see the DVD-Video specification.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves which methods are currently valid.

param.name: pUOP
param.para: Pointer to a DWORD value containing bits for all user operations (UOP). Each bit in the DWORD represents the state (valid or not valid) of a user operation. If the bit corresponding to a user operation is set, then that user operation is prohibited. For more information, see Remarks.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .
The value of pUOP is a bit field defined as follows.
This method is useful because DVD titles can enable or disable individual user operations at almost any point during playback.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current video attributes for the current title or menu.

param.name: pATR
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved video attributes.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_VideoManagerMenu, DVD_DOMAIN_VideoTitleSetMenu, or DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .
For information about DVD_VideoATR, see the DVD-Video specification.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current DVD volume information.

param.name: pulNumOfVol
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of volumes in the volume set.

param.name: pulThisVolNum
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved volume number for this root directory.

param.name: pSide
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved current disc side ().

param.name: pulNumOfTitles
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of titles available in this volume.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the TXTDT_MG structure, which can contain text descriptions for title name, volume name, producer name, vocalist name, and so on, in various languages.

param.name: pTextManager
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved text manager.

param.name: ulBufSize
param.para: Size of the buffer for pTextManager, in bytes.

param.name: pulActualSize
param.para: Pointer to a value containing the number of bytes of data returned.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

If the supplied buffer size in cbBufSize is too small for the data, (for example if cbBufSize equals zero), then this method returns E_OUTOFMEMORY and sets the value pointed to by pcbActualSize to the required size.
For more information, refer to Section 4.1.6 and Annex A of the DVD-Video specification.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the number of chapters that are defined for a given title.

param.name: ulTitle
param.para: Title for which to retrieve the number of chapters.

param.name: pulNumberOfChapters
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved number of chapters for the specified title.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the current parental level and country/region code settings for the DVD player.

param.name: pulParentalLevel
param.para: Pointer to a value indicating the current parental level.

param.name: pulCountryCode
param.para: Pointer to a value indicating the current country/region code.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .
For the defined parental levels, see Table 3.3.4-1 of the DVD-Video specification.
Valid parental levels are 1 through 8 if parental management is enabled, 0xffffffff if parental management is disabled.
For the country/region codes, see ISO3166 : Alpha-2 Code.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the root directory that is set in the player.

param.name: pRoot
param.para: Pointer to the buffer to receive the root string. Note that the root string uses ANSI characters.

param.name: ulBufSize
param.para: Size of buffer passed in, in bytes.

param.name: pulActualSize
param.para: Pointer to a value containing the size of the actual data returned.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: If a valid root was found, this method returns the root string. Otherwise, it returns zero for pcbActualSize, indicating that a valid root directory has not been found or initialized.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves attributes of all video, audio, and subpicture streams for the specified title, including menus.

param.name: ulTitle
param.para: Requested title number. Specify 0xFFFFFFFF for the current title.

param.name: pATR
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved attributes structure.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the parental levels that are defined for a particular title.

param.name: ulTitle
param.para: Title for which parental levels are requested.

param.name: pulParentalLevels
param.para: Pointer to a logical OR combination of the parental levels defined for the title. A higher setting will block out more content than a lower setting. Valid parental levels are the following:

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves the total playback time for the current title.

param.name: pulTotalTime
param.para: Pointer to the total time in format, which includes hours, minutes, seconds, and frames.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method returns an error unless the domain is DVD_DOMAIN_Title. For more information, see .
The method is restricted to simple linear movies by design.

summary.para: Note The IDvdInfo interface is deprecated. Use instead.
Retrieves attributes of all video, audio, and subpicture streams for video manager (VMG) menus.

param.name: pATR
param.para: Pointer to the retrieved attributes structure.

description.para: DVD is not initialized or domain is not DVD_DOMAIN_Title.
Success.
Requested action is not supported on this domain ().
Requested action cannot occur at this point in the movie due to the authoring of the current DVD-Video disc.

remarks.para: This method is valid in any domain. For more information, see .
The video manager contains a separate group of streams, such as the DVD_MENU_Title menus (see ), and the streams are not associated with any particular title number.

summary.para: Note This interface has been deprecated. It will continue to be supported for backward compatibility with existing applications, but new applications should use .

The IDvdInfo interface enables an application to query for attributes of available DVD titles and the DVD player status. It also allows for control of a DVD player beyond Annex J in the DVD specification. Use this interface to retrieve details about a DVD-Video or about the current state of the DVD player filter graph.
